document.full_text: lebron james failed to get past the boston celtics as a cleveland cavalier, but after finally downing the green giant with an outstanding performance for the miami heat wednesday the most polarizing figure in american sport said sorry to his old fans.
document.title: after night of glory, james finally says sorry to cleveland
lines_and_colors: lebron james failed to get past the boston celtics as a cleveland cavalier, but after finally downing the green giant with an outstanding performance for the miami heat wednesday the most polarizing figure in american sport said sorry to his old fans.
